channel.title: Hugo Defaults on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo Defaults on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Client Side Search Engine for Hugo Website
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to setup client side search engine for Hugo Website without any backend server or additional build steps required.

item.title: Customize sitemap in Hugo Website
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to disable or customize sitemap.xml for Hugo website.
